hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select JOB_.JOB_ID, JOB_.PARENT_ID, JOB_.EBPL_CITY_ID, JOB_.COMPANY_NO, JOB_.COMPANY_NAME_EN, JOB_.SEND_CODE, JOB_.ADDRESS_CN, JOB_.ADDRESS_EN, JOB_.POSTALCODE, JOB_.FAX, JOB_.URL, JOB_.BUSINESS_NO, JOB_.PHONE, JOB_.TAX_NO, JOB_.CURRENCY, JOB_.FINANCE_CODE, JOB_.STATUS, JOB_.CDH_CODE, JOB_.REC_VER, JOB_.CREATE_TIME, JOB_.CREATOR, JOB_.MODIFY_TIME, JOB_.MODIFIER, JOB_.PATH, JOB_.EBPL_CITY_CODE, JOB_.REC_STATUS, JOB_.ENABLED_FLAG, JOB_.ORG_ID, JOB_.BUS_DEPT_CODE, JOB_.BUS_DEPT_NAME, JOB_.LEDGER_ID, JOB_.LEDGER_NAME, JOB_.LEGAL_ENTITY_ID, JOB_.LEGAL_ENTITY_NAME, JOB_.OPERATING_UNIT_ID, JOB_.OPERATING_UNIT_NAME, JOB_.COMPANY_CODE, JOB_.COMPANY_NAME, JOB_.OPERATING_UNIT_END_DATE from EF_ORGAN_RELATION JOB_ where 1 = 1 <<and JOB_.JOB_ID LIKE '%' || :jobId || '%'>> <<and JOB_.PARENT_ID LIKE '%' || :parentId || '%'>> <<and JOB_.EBPL_CITY_ID LIKE '%' || :ebplCityId || '%'>> <<and JOB_.COMPANY_NO LIKE '%' || :companyNo || '%'>> <<and JOB_.COMPANY_NAME_EN LIKE '%' || :companyNameEn || '%'>> <<and JOB_.SEND_CODE LIKE '%' || :sendCode || '%'>> <<and JOB_.ADDRESS_CN LIKE '%' || :addressCn || '%'>> <<and JOB_.ADDRESS_EN LIKE '%' || :addressEn || '%'>> <<and JOB_.POSTALCODE LIKE '%' || :postalcode || '%'>> <<and JOB_.FAX LIKE '%' || :fax || '%'>> <<and JOB_.URL LIKE '%' || :url || '%'>> <<and JOB_.BUSINESS_NO LIKE '%' || :businessNo || '%'>> <<and JOB_.PHONE LIKE '%' || :phone || '%'>> <<and JOB_.TAX_NO LIKE '%' || :taxNo || '%'>> <<and JOB_.CURRENCY LIKE '%' || :currency || '%'>> <<and JOB_.FINANCE_CODE LIKE '%' || :financeCode || '%'>> <<and JOB_.STATUS LIKE '%' || :status || '%'>> <<and JOB_.CDH_CODE LIKE '%' || :cdhCode || '%' >> <<and JOB_.REC_VER LIKE '%' || :recVer || '%' >> <<and JOB_.CREATE_TIME=:createTime>> <<and JOB_.CREATOR LIKE '%' || :creator || '%' >> <<and JOB_.MODIFY_TIME=:modifyTime>> <<and JOB_.MODIFIER LIKE '%' || :modifier || '%' >> <<and JOB_.PATH LIKE '%' || :path || '%' >> <<and JOB_.EBPL_CITY_CODE LIKE '%' || :ebplCityCode || '%' >> <<and JOB_.REC_STATUS LIKE '%' || :recStatus>> <<and JOB_.ENABLED_FLAG LIKE '%' || :enabledFlag || '%' >> <<and JOB_.ORG_ID=:orgId >> <<and JOB_.BUS_DEPT_CODE LIKE '%' || :busDeptCode || '%' >> <<and JOB_.BUS_DEPT_NAME LIKE '%' || :busDeptName || '%' >> <<and JOB_.LEDGER_ID LIKE '%' || :ledgerId || '%' >> <<and JOB_.LEDGER_NAME LIKE '%' || :ledgerName || '%' >> <<and JOB_.LEGAL_ENTITY_ID LIKE '%' || :legalEntityId || '%'>> <<and JOB_.LEGAL_ENTITY_NAME LIKE '%' || :legalEntityName || '%'>> <<and JOB_.OPERATING_UNIT_ID LIKE '%' || :operatingUnitId || '%'>> <<and JOB_.OPERATING_UNIT_NAME LIKE '%' || :operatingUnitName || '%'>> <<and JOB_.COMPANY_CODE LIKE '%' || :companyCode || '%'>> <<and JOB_.COMPANY_NAME LIKE '%' || :companyName || '%' >> <<and JOB_.OPERATING_UNIT_END_DATE LIKE '%' || :operatingUnitEndDate || '%' >>
